archimate:TechnologyService.name: AzureSQLDatabase
archimate:TechnologyService.documentation:
https://azure.microsoft.com/fr-fr/services/sql-database/ The best destination for fully managed SQL in the cloud Azure SQL Database is the intelligent, scalable, cloud database service that provides the broadest SQL Server engine compatibility and up to a 212% return on investment. Migrate existing apps or build new apps on Azure - the best cloud destination for your mission-critical SQL Server workloads.
Azure SQL Database is now Azure Arc-enabled. You can run this service on premises on infrastructure of your choice with cloud benefits like automation, no end of support, unified management, and a cloud billing model.
